text: Hi all, I am looking for an experienced HubSpot developer to help out with our website redesign. Some of the features we are looking to include: *search* (overall site, blog by category/tag), email *splash screens for premium content* ('if you want to continue reading, please enter your email address'), custom modules for text, image and video content. Most pages will be infinite-scrolling based therefore knowing how to structure them for *SEO* is also key. Start date: 26th February, end date: 3rd of April (5 weeks). Drop me a message if this would be of interest to discuss further! :)
I didn't even know this channel existed! Thanks <@UDU6KEBFB>
